stories.title: Remove 5 duplicate/sub-step abilities from registry
acceptance: Remove post-call-summary from ABILITY_REGISTRY (duplicate of Post-Meeting Follow-up)
Remove pre-meeting-nudge from ABILITY_REGISTRY (duplicate of Pre-Meeting Briefing)
Remove call-type-classification, coaching-micro-feedback, detect-intents (sub-steps, not standalone)
SEQUENCE_STEPS and SKILL_DISPLAY_NAMES remain unchanged (they map orchestrator steps, not UI abilities)
No console errors when navigating Agent Abilities page

stories.title: Merge Morning Brief + Daily Focus Planner into single Daily Briefing ability
acceptance: Single 'Daily Briefing' ability replaces both morning-brief and sales-assistant-digest
Uses daily-focus-planner skillKey (richer output)
Stage: pre-meeting, triggerType: cron, backendType: v1-simulate
Default channels: ['in-app']
Agent Abilities page shows merged ability correctly

stories.title: Update ProactiveAgentV2Demo scenarios for cleaned registry
acceptance: ProactiveAgentV2Demo page loads without errors
Demo scenarios reference only abilities that exist in cleaned registry
No broken imports or missing ability references

stories.title: Add Deal Stage Change Alert ability
acceptance: New ability 'deal-stage-change' in ABILITY_REGISTRY
Stage: pipeline, triggerType: event, backendType: v1-simulate
skillKey: deal-next-best-actions (closest existing skill)
Description covers: deal progression/regression notification, context, suggested next actions
Appears in Pipeline stage on Agent Abilities page
Default channels: ['slack', 'in-app']

stories.title: Add Win/Loss Post-Mortem ability
acceptance: New ability 'win-loss-postmortem' in ABILITY_REGISTRY
Stage: coaching, triggerType: event, backendType: v1-simulate
skillKey: coaching-analysis (closest existing skill)
Description covers: deal won/lost analysis, meeting patterns, learnings, Slack notification
Appears in Coaching stage on Agent Abilities page
Default channels: ['slack']

stories.title: Add Account Intelligence Digest ability
acceptance: New ability 'account-intel-digest' in ABILITY_REGISTRY
Stage: pre-meeting, triggerType: cron, backendType: v1-simulate
skillKey: company-research (closest existing skill)
Description covers: weekly account monitoring for news, funding, leadership changes, competitor mentions
Appears in Pre-Meeting stage on Agent Abilities page
Default channels: ['slack', 'in-app']

stories.title: Verify Agent Abilities page renders correctly with final 18-ability registry
acceptance: All 5 lifecycle stages show correct ability counts
Pre-Meeting: 3 (Pre-Meeting Briefing, Daily Briefing, Account Intel Digest)
Post-Meeting: 1 (Post-Meeting Follow-up)
Pipeline: 4 (Calendar Scheduling, Stale Deal Revival, Stale Deal Alert, Deal Stage Change Alert)
Outreach: 6 (Email Classification, Email Send-as-Rep, HITL Follow-up Email, Email Reply Received, Proposal Generation, Campaign Monitoring)
Coaching: 4 (Weekly Coaching Digest, Coaching Analysis, Win/Loss Post-Mortem, 60 Smart Suggestion)
